Search the NPPES NPI Registry

Source: R/end_nppes.R
npi_nppes.Rd

Search the NPPES NPI Registry

Usage

npi_nppes(
  npi = NULL,
  entity = NULL,
  first = NULL,
  last = NULL,
  organization = NULL,
  name_type = NULL,
  taxonomy_desc = NULL,
  city = NULL,
  state = NULL,
  zip = NULL,
  country = NULL
)

Source

API Documentation

Arguments

npi

<chr> Search terms, separated by spaces

entity

<chr> Entity type: individual or organization

first

<chr> Individual provider's first name

last

<chr> Individual provider's last name

organization

<chr> Organizational provider's name

name_type

<chr> Name purpose: legal or de

taxonomy_desc

<chr> Taxonomy description

city

<chr> City

state

<chr> State

zip

<chr> Zip code

country

<chr> Country code

Value

<tibble> of search results

Examples

# npi_nppes(npi = npi_ex$k)
